about_the_game:
Nogalious is a pixel-art action adventure set in a medieval-themed universe with plenty of puzzles and menacing challenges. Take on the role of Nogalious, a former knight of the Kingdom of Rusadir, and explore 5 different worlds to save your daughter Mariet from the evil claws of Darama.

Classic 8-bit 2D platforming now on Steam

Nogalious brings back the magic of 8-bit computers to your PC! Originally released on MSX, Spectrum, Amstrad and Commodore 64, this brand new version on Steam adds more than 100 achievements and genuine retro playability.

Fight the malign forces of darkness

Stop Darama, former right hand of King Alphan, from conquering the Kingdom of Rusadir. Beat the armies of minions commanded by 4 terrifying bosses –Zovach, Grotton, Harmor and Lordaf– and bring Mariet back home. As in classy adventures, use different objects and weapons to ruin Darama’s plans!

reviews:
“A great nostalgia trip, A game likes this really hits you in the childhood and runs with it. A solid 2D platformer full of difficult boss battles and clever level design. I could easily see this on my TV back in the day and it made me smile, Well in between all the swearing as like I say it is a bit difficult in places. InIts a short review as its a very clear-cut game, Its retro looking, Plays like a retro game and is worth your time.”
7.4 / 10 – GERT LUSH GAMING

“Si sois amantes de los videojuegos retro, os traemos una propuesta que no podréis rechazar.”
HOBBY CONSOLAS

“Nogalious, é um game que te prende em todos os sentidos, fazendo com que você queira jogar mais e mais até finaliza-lo. Apesar de apresentar uma certa dificuldade em algumas fases, é um joga que da gosto de tentar novamente, porque em vez de te deixar nervoso com o desafio, ele te traz diversão e satisfação ao superar os seus limites e concluir os desafios. Sou muito crítico quanto a jogos, mas quando o jogo é bom eu reconheço e esse mereceu nota máxima em nossa review. Parabéns LUEGOLU3GO STUDIOS, continuem nesse caminho que tem tudo pra dar certo.”
10 / 10 – JAM GAMES BRASIL
short_description: Nogalious is a retro-style action platformer that pays homage to the era of classic 2D platforming on 8-bit personal computers. Explore 5 different worlds and go through cozy dungeons in the first title of a trilogy that tells the story of Nogalious, his daughter Mariet, and the evil Darama.
